scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder contains letters and three copies of a funeral notice for John Morgan Duke, the infant son of Henrietta and Basil Duke. Some letters discuss family matters like welcoming Ellen Key Morgan to the Hunt-Morgan family following her marriage to Charlton Hunt Morgan or giving condolences to Henrietta Duke for the loss of her son, while others discuss photos to be used for a portrait of the late John Hunt Morgan.
